div.div:
Initialize:
attempt = 0
baseDelay = 1s
maxDelay = 30s
jitter = random(0, 0.5)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 305px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 133px; height: 1px; padding-top: 450px; margin-left: 187px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
attempt++
delay = min(
baseDelay * 2^attempt,
maxDelay
) * (1 + jitter)

div.div:
- Jitter prevents thundering herd
- Max attempts typically 10-15
- Reset attempt counter on success
- Consider network type changes
- May fast-retry once before backoff
- Log each attempt for debugging
- Notify UI after N failures
- Support manual retry trigger

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 500px; margin-left: 731px;

div.div:
- Network connectivity loss
- Server closes connection
- Ping timeout (no pong)
- TTL expiry without refresh
- Protocol error / malformed frame
- Server maintenance (code 1001)

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
